title: Eldritch Invocations
content: Beguiling Influence - Available at level 2 Devil's Sight - Available at level 2 Fiendish Vigor - Available at level 2 Mask of Many Faces - Available at level 2 Repelling Blast - Available at level 2 Thief of Five Fates - Available at level 2 One with Shadows - Available at level 2 Mire the Mind - Available at level 5 Sign of Ill Omen - Available at level 5 Book of Ancient Secrets - Available at level 7 Dreadful Word - Available at level 7 Sculptor of Flesh - Available at level 7 Minions of Chaos
